metadata.title: GB Battery Storage BMU Units - VLP Analysis
metadata.description: Complete list of battery storage BMU units in GB balancing mechanism with Virtual Lead Party (VLP) identification
metadata.data_source: NESO BMRS API + BMU Registration Data

data_fields.elexonBmUnit: Elexon BMU identifier (used in BOD data)
data_fields.bmUnitType: Type of BMU unit (E=embedded, T=transmission, V=virtual)
data_fields.is_vlp: True if operated by Virtual Lead Party (any VLP criteria met)
data_fields.is_vlp_by_name: True if VLP identified by company name keywords
data_fields.is_aggregator_code: True if BMU code indicates aggregation (2__, C__, M__)
data_fields.multiple_assets: True if lead party manages multiple BMUs (portfolio)
